abstract: Boeing officially announces that Dennis A Muilenburg will replace W James McNerney Jr as chief executive in July 2015, confirming widely-expected transition; change comes at good time for company as it rides wave of orders for new and more fuel-efficient commercial planes.
lead_paragraph: Analysts said the transition was expected and came as the company is riding a wave of orders for more fuel-efficient planes to new highs in profit.

headline.main: Boeing Names Next C.E.O., Affirming Its Heir Apparent
headline.print_headline: The Heir Apparent Is Affirmed as Boeing Names Its Next Chief

snippet: Analysts said the transition was expected and came as the company is riding a wave of orders for more fuel-efficient planes to new highs in profit.
